summary: The iPod was a popular music and video player made by Apple. It first came out in 2001 and was very successful, with around 450 million sold. You could store your music, photos, and videos on it and connect it to your computer to transfer files. The iPod was discontinued in 2022, but its features are now part of Apple's iPhone and iPad. The iPhone eventually became more popular than the iPod.
title: IPod
